articles.title: O.J. Simpson's estate to fight payouts to Brown, Goldman families - ESPN
articles.description: The executor of O.J. Simpson's estate will work to prevent a payout of a $33.5 million judgment stemming from the wrongful death lawsuit filed by the families of Simpson's ex-wife Nicole Brown Simpson and Ron Goldman nearly 30 years ago.
